comments.body: From our offline discussion, I think we can solve the permissions problems discussed in #3888 by excluding `test_docker_projects` from the skinny client tests. That way, we can rename / move this file to `tests/server/test_cli.py` (as this PR attempted to do before)

from unittest import mock
import os
